oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Homer Pittard, author of The First Fifty Years
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Homer Pittard, author of The First Fifty Years, a history of the institution from 1911 to 1961

Homer Pittard was a Rutherford County educator who had served as principal at McFadden School and Central High School and as Director of University Affairs at MTSU. He also served as editor of The Mid-Stater, an alumni publication. As an undergraduate at the institution, Pittard was a member of the Writers’ Club, the Dramatic Club, and the football team, and he served as editor of the Midlander.
